thread.title: International Game Technology To Correct Classification Of Upfront Payments To Customers In Consolidated Statements Of Cash Flows In Its Form 20-F

author: Reuters Editorial
title: International Game Technology To Correct Classification Of Upfront Payments To Customers In Consolidated Statements Of Cash Flows In Its Form 20-F
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - International Game Technology Plc :
* INTERNATIONAL GAME TECHNOLOGY -‍ TO CORRECT CLASSIFICATION OF UPFRONT PAYMENTS TO CUSTOMERS IN CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF CASH FLOWS IN ITS FORM 20-F
* INTERNATIONAL GAME TECHNOLOGY- CHANGE IN CLASSIFICATION PRIMARILY RELATES TO AMOUNTS PAID IN CONNECTION WITH ITALIAN LOTTO CONCESSION IN 2016​
* INTERNATIONAL GAME TECHNOLOGY PLC - ‍ UPFRONT PAYMENTS WILL NOW BE INCLUDED AS AN OPERATING CASH OUTFLOW IN COMPANY‘S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS​
* INTERNATIONAL GAME TECHNOLOGY PLC - ‍CHANGE IN CLASSIFICATION WILL HAVE NO IMPACT ON PREVIOUSLY REPORTED PROFITABILITY AND NON-GAAP LIQUIDITY MEASURES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
